answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
Ask your police department to develop this.   Reports get changed over time based on current issues of relavance to the community.  Your PD could use State reporting forms also as a start.  Ask for information in different formats, a listing, charts and graphs to see how best you and others convert the information to something meaningful.

answers.author: Leonard Matarese
answers.text:
The key function in determining if activity levels are exceeding a police department’s capabilities is to conduct a workload analysis, comparing workload (a time element) to deployment. I have attached a document which describes the process and some samples of how ICMA performs those measurements. The question to be asked and answered is “What amount of time do patrol officers have non-committed, after completing calls for service (both citizen and officer initiated), and administrative tasks.

author: Jerry Andree
text: I am searching for an example of a monthly activity report that is more than stats, but one uses stats to provide a dashboard look at the departments performance and if the activitiy level is causing a burden to the department.
title: Police Department Activity Reports - More than stats
